message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value to us at $1,500,000. Considering its worth to you, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if we could come to an agreement. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive and tailored to recognize your interest and potential in maximizing the product's value. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further details. We look forward to the possibility of a successful transaction.
